name: Jam with the Band
description:
Jam with the Band is an action game developed by Nintendo SPD Group 1. It came out on 26-06-2008. It was published by Nintendo. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Jam with the Band is available on Nintendo DS.
It was scored by Asuka Ito, Masaru Tajima, Megumi Inoue and Minako Hamano.
